user_query: I'm planning a solo trip to Tokyo and I need to book a hotel. Can you help me find a budget-friendly hotel near the city center? Also, provide me with the trip details for my reservation using the ASR Hub API.

TaskList.description: Search for budget-friendly hotels in Tokyo city center.
Select a hotel from the search results.
Book the selected hotel for the specified dates.
Retrieve trip details for the hotel reservation.
